ygData.subject: Re: Digest Number 87
ygData.msgSnippet: Let s just clear this up once and for all.  I have been trying to decide what class/race I like the best for a long, long time.  Right now I have a lvl 13
ygData.messageBody:
Let's just clear this up once and for all. I have been trying to decide
what class/race I like the best for a long, long time. Right now I have a
lvl 13 BAR/warrior, lvl 12 ERU/wizard, and lvl 18 TSK, and guess what, i'm
making a lvl 1 halfling rouge and he's gonna have a combine spear or rapier
(have'nt decided yet) and full banded mail, from lvl 1...you know
why?...because i've put too much freaking work into my characters to just
throw it all away, i'm trying to maximize my enjoyment of the game, and to
do that, I must A: not feel that all of my work since this game came out is
for nothing, B: find the class/race that i really love to play...in the
words of Owen Heart: THAT'S THE BOTTEM LINE (wait he did'nt say that did
he?...oh well, he's dead anyway)
